TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Clipboard extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供將資料放置於系統，以及從系統剪貼簿擷取資料的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to place data on and retrieve data from the system Clipboard.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得一份預先定義的格式，以搭配類別，請參閱類別。For a list of predefined formats to use with the class, see the class. 呼叫資料放入剪貼簿，並取代它目前的內容。Call to put data on the Clipboard, replacing its current contents. 若要將資料永續性複本放在剪貼簿上，設定`copy`參數來`true`。To place a persistent copy of the data on the Clipboard, set the `copy` parameter to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 若要將資料放在剪貼簿以多種格式，使用類別或實作。To place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats, use the class or an implementation. 將資料放到最大可能目標的應用程式，其格式需求，您可能不知道，可以成功擷取的資料以多種格式剪貼簿上。Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data. 呼叫從剪貼簿擷取資料。Call to retrieve data from the Clipboard. 資料以實作的物件傳回介面。The data is returned as an object that implements the interface. 使用指定的方法中的欄位和從物件擷取資料。Use the methods specified by and fields in to extract the data from the object. 如果您不知道您所擷取之資料的格式，呼叫方法的介面，以取得一份所有格式的資料會儲存在。If you do not know the format of the data you retrieved, call the method of the interface to get a list of all formats that data is stored in. 然後呼叫方法的介面，並指定您的應用程式可以使用的格式。Then call the method of the interface, and specify a format that your application can use. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，則類別會提供額外的方法，讓您輕鬆地使用系統剪貼簿。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with the system Clipboard. 呼叫從剪貼簿移除所有資料的方法。Call the method to remove all data from the Clipboard. 若要加入剪貼簿中的特定格式的資料，若要取代現有的資料，呼叫適當`Set`*格式*方法，例如，或呼叫方法，以指定的格式。To add data of a particular format to the Clipboard, replacing the existing data, call the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as , or call the method to specify the format. 若要從剪貼簿中擷取特定格式的資料，請先呼叫適當`Contains`*格式*方法 (例如) 方法來判斷 [剪貼簿] 是否包含資料的格式，然後再呼叫適當`Get`*格式*方法 (例如) 來擷取資料，如果剪貼簿包含它。To retrieve data of a particular format from the Clipboard, first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as ) method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format, and then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as ) to retrieve the data if the Clipboard contains it. 若要在這些作業中指定的格式，呼叫和方法改為。To specify the format in these operations, call the and methods instead. > [!NOTE] > 所有以 Windows 為基礎的應用程式會共用系統剪貼簿，因此當您切換到另一個應用程式內容可能會有所變更。All Windows-based applications share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application. > > 物件必須可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果您將不可序列化物件傳遞至剪貼簿方法時，此方法將會失敗而不擲回例外狀況。If you pass a non-serializable object to a Clipboard method, the method will fail without throwing an exception. 請參閱如需有關序列化。See for more information on serialization. 如果您的目標應用程式需要非常特定的資料格式，在序列化程序中的資料加入標頭可能會導致應用程式無法辨識您的資料。If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data. 若要保留您的資料格式，將資料做為陣列，並傳遞到方法。To preserve your data format, add your data as a array to a and pass the to the method. > > 類別只能設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒中。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法會標示屬性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. > > 使用剪貼簿的中繼檔格式時，可能需要特殊考量。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard. 由於目前的實作限制類別，.NET Framework 所使用的中繼檔格式可能無法辨識的應用程式使用較舊的中繼檔格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在此情況下，您必須使用 Win32 剪貼簿應用程式開發介面 (Api) 在互通。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用將資料放在與系統剪貼簿擷取它的方法。The following code example uses methods to place data on and retrieve it from the system Clipboard. 此程式碼假設`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已建立並放置在表單上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on the form. `button1_Click`方法呼叫接受選取的文字從文字方塊中，並將它放在系統剪貼簿上。The `button1_Click` method calls to take selected text from the text box and place it on the system Clipboard. `button2_Click`方法呼叫從系統剪貼簿擷取資料。The `button2_Click` method calls to retrieve data from the system Clipboard. 程式碼會使用並擷取傳回的資料，並顯示在資料`textBox2`。The code uses and to extract the data returned and displays the data in `textBox2`. [!code-cpp[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含您可以使用這個方法的預先定義的格式名稱。The class contains pre-defined format names that you can use with this method. 使用此方法來判斷 剪貼簿是否包含指定的格式或相容的格式中的資料，然後才能擷取它與方法。Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified format or a compatible format before retrieving it with the method. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許的轉換，而且如果所要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 類別只能設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒中。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法會標示屬性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個成員。The following example demonstrates this member. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷 剪貼簿是否包含指定的格式或相容的格式中的資料，然後再擷取與這個方法。Use the method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified format or a compatible format before retrieving it with this method. 如果這個方法在指定的格式中找不到資料，它會嘗試將資料轉換成格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果資料無法轉換成指定的格式，或是儲存資料時自動轉換設定為`false`，這個方法會傳回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許的轉換，而且如果所要求的格式與預存格式相容。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 類別只能設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒中。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法會標示屬性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. 使用方法將資料加入到剪貼簿，以特定格式。Use the method to add data to the Clipboard in a particular format. ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個成員。The following example demonstrates this member. remarks.format: ## Remarks 從剪貼簿傳回之物件的資料類型可能會不同，因為這個方法會傳回在資料。Because the data type of the object returned from the Clipboard can vary, this method returns the data in an . 然後您可以使用的方法介面，以擷取其適當的資料型別中的資料。Then you can use methods of the interface to extract the data in its proper data type. 這個方法會嘗試取得十倍 100 毫秒的間隔中的資料，並擲回如果所有嘗試都都會失敗。This method attempts to get the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 類別只能設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒中。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法會標示屬性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用將資料放在與系統剪貼簿擷取它的方法。The following code example uses methods to place data on and retrieve it from the system Clipboard. 此程式碼假設`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已放在表單上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been placed on the form. `button1_Click`方法呼叫接受選取的文字從文字方塊中，並將它放在系統剪貼簿上。The `button1_Click` method calls to take selected text from the text box and place it on the system Clipboard. `button2_Click`方法呼叫從系統剪貼簿擷取資料。The `button2_Click` method calls to retrieve data from the system Clipboard. 程式碼會使用和擷取傳回的資料。The code uses and to extract the data returned. 資料會顯示在`textBox2`。The data is displayed in `textBox2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式結束時，資料會從系統剪貼簿中刪除。Data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. 這個方法會嘗試設定在 100 毫秒的間隔，十倍的資料，並擲回如果所有嘗試都都會失敗。This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 物件必須可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果您將不可序列化物件傳遞給這個方法時，它將會失敗而不擲回例外狀況。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 請參閱如需有關序列化。See for more information on serialization. > > 類別只能設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒中。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法會標示屬性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用放置到系統剪貼簿的非持續性的文字資料。The following code example uses to place nonpersistent text data onto the system Clipboard. 在 `button1_Click`方法中，選取的文字會從複製`textBox1`並貼上剪貼簿上。In the `button1_Click` method, the selected text is copied from `textBox1` and pasted on the Clipboard. 在 `button2_Click`方法中，資訊會從剪貼簿擷取並顯示在`textBox2`。In the `button2_Click` method, the information is retrieved from the Clipboard and displayed in `textBox2`. 此程式碼假設`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已建立並在表單上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`copy`參數是`false`，應用程式結束時，會從系統剪貼簿刪除資料。If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. 這個方法會嘗試設定在 100 毫秒的間隔，十倍的資料，並擲回如果所有嘗試都都會失敗。This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 物件必須可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果您將不可序列化物件傳遞給這個方法時，它將會失敗而不擲回例外狀況。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 請參閱如需有關序列化。See for more information on serialization. > > 類別只能設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒中。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法會標示屬性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下列方法會執行應用程式中。The following method is run in an application. 就會在系統剪貼簿上的文字方塊中將選取的文字資料永續性複本。It places a persistent copy of the selected text data in the text box on the system Clipboard. 此程式碼假設`button1`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已建立並在表單上。This code assumes `button1`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 在不同的應用程式中，下列方法從系統剪貼簿擷取文字並貼到文字`textBox2`。In a different application, the following method retrieves the text from the system Clipboard and pastes the text into `textBox2`. 此程式碼假設`button2`和`textBox2`已建立並在表單上。This code assumes `button2` and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 將資料加入至剪貼簿可以偶爾會失敗如果剪貼簿正忙著處理另一個執行緒或應用程式。Adding data to the Clipboard can occasionally fail if the Clipboard is busy with another thread or application. 此方法相當實用，若要解決此問題在環境中經常使用剪貼簿。This method is useful to work around this issue in environments with heavy Clipboard use. 如果`copy`參數是`false`，應用程式結束時，會從系統剪貼簿刪除資料。If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. > [!NOTE] > 物件必須可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果您將不可序列化物件傳遞給這個方法時，它將會失敗而不擲回例外狀況。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 請參閱如需有關序列化。See for more information on serialization. > > 類別只能設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒中。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法會標示屬性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute.
